data.trans_hint: Làm sao tôi biết được chữ ký này là thật?
data.en_hint: How can I be sure the signature is authentic?
data.content_game_1: How can I be sure the signature is authentic?
data.answer_en_hint: How can I be sure the signature is authentic?

data.trans_hint: Số tiền được ủng hộ bởi một nhà từ thiện giấu tên.
data.en_hint: The money was donated by an anonymous benefactor.
data.content_game_1: The money was donated by an anonymous benefactor.
data.answer_en_hint: The money was donated by an anonymous benefactor.

data.trans_hint: Tôi đã gửi cho anh ấy một lá thư chia buồn.
data.en_hint: I sent him a letter of condolence.
data.content_game_1: I sent him a letter of condolence.
data.answer_en_hint: I sent him a letter of condolence.

data.trans: (+about/ on sth) Sự đồng thuận, sự nhất trí
data.trans_hint: Rất khó đạt được sự đồng thuận về vấn đề cải cách bầu cử.
data.en_hint: It is very difficult to reach a consensus about electoral reform.
data.content_game_1: It is very difficult to reach a consensus about electoral reform.
data.answer_en_hint: It is very difficult to reach a consensus about electoral reform.

data.trans_hint: Nhóm đã tạo ra một màn trình diễn đáng khen.
data.en_hint: The team produced a creditable performance.
data.content_game_1: The team produced a creditable performance.
data.answer_en_hint: The team produced a creditable performance.

data.trans: Lịch thiệp, khéo léo, nhã nhặn, ý tứ
data.trans_hint: Tôi ngưỡng mộ cách anh ta xử lý tình huống rất khéo léo.
data.en_hint: I admired his delicate handling of the situation.
data.content_game_1: I admired his delicate handling of the situation.
data.answer_en_hint: I admired his delicate handling of the situation.

data.trans: Bản chất, cốt lõi, điều cốt yếu
data.trans_hint: Về bản chất, hoàn cảnh của bạn không quá khác so với tôi.
data.en_hint: In essence, your situation isn't so different from mine.
data.content_game_1: In essence, your situation isn't so different from mine.
data.answer_en_hint: In essence, your situation isn't so different from mine.

data.trans: Sự kính mến, sự quý trọng
data.trans_hint: Anh ấy đã giành được sự kính trọng lớn.
data.content_game_1: He had won great esteem.
data.answer_en_hint: He had won great esteem.

data.trans_hint: Adam được ca ngợi là một anh hùng vì đã cứu một đứa trẻ nhỏ khỏi chết đuối.
data.en_hint: Adam is being hailed a hero for saving a young child from drowning.
data.content_game_1: Adam is being hailed a hero for saving a young child from drowning.
data.answer_en_hint: Adam is being hailed a hero for saving a young child from drowning.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy tìm thấy một thú vui ngoan cố khi làm cha mẹ buồn lòng.
data.en_hint: She finds a perverse pleasure in upsetting her parents.
data.content_game_1: She finds a perverse pleasure in upsetting her parents.
data.answer_en_hint: She finds a perverse pleasure in upsetting her parents.

data.trans: Phản bội, bội bạc, bội tín
data.trans_hint: Hành động phản bội của cô ấy đã tự hủy hoại bản thân.
data.en_hint: Her treacherous actions brought down ruin on herself.
data.content_game_1: Her treacherous actions brought down ruin on herself.
data.answer_en_hint: Her treacherous actions brought down ruin on herself.

data.trans_hint: Những vũ công đều duyên dáng.
data.content_game_1: The dancers all were graceful.
data.answer_en_hint: The dancers all were graceful.
